title: Remove streams from channels
description:
Implement ability to remove streams from channels:
- When viewing a channel's assigned streams, show remove button (X or minus icon)
- Confirmation before removal (optional, could be a setting)
- Call API to remove stream from channel
- Optimistic UI update with rollback on error
- Success/error toast notifications
- Alternative: drag stream out of channel to 'unassign' area

title: Add file upload functionality for logos in Edit Channel modal
description: Added ability to upload logo images from local files in the Edit Channel modal. Added file input with hidden input, 'Upload Image' button, CSS styling for the upload section with 'or' divider between URL and file options.

title: Streams pane dropdowns should match Channels pane style
description: The Providers and Groups dropdown filters in the Streams pane should have the same styling and behavior as the Groups dropdown in the Channels pane (consistent UI/UX across panes).
close_reason: Fixed: Streams pane now uses multi-select checkbox dropdowns for Providers and Groups filters, matching the Channels pane style.

title: Replace unicode/text icons with Material Icons in HistoryToolbar, EditModeToggle, and EditModeBanner
close_reason: Added Material Icons CDN to index.html, replaced unicode characters with Material Icons in HistoryToolbar (undo, redo, bookmark_add, close, fiber_manual_record), EditModeToggle (edit, check), and EditModeBanner (edit). Updated CSS for proper icon sizing.

title: Frontend: Two-pane layout with channels (left) and streams (right)
description:
Create the main UI layout:
- Left pane: Channels list
  - Display channel name, number, logo
  - Show count of assigned streams per channel
  - Clicking a channel shows its assigned streams (expandable or inline)
  - Scrollable list with virtualization for performance
- Right pane: Streams list  
  - Display stream name, logo, provider info
  - Visual indicator if stream is already assigned to selected channel
  - Scrollable list with virtualization for performance
- Responsive layout that works on various screen sizes
- Loading states and error handling

title: Backend API endpoints for frontend consumption
description:
Create FastAPI endpoints that proxy/aggregate Dispatcharr data:
- GET /api/channels - list channels with filtering support
- GET /api/channels/{id}/streams - get streams assigned to a channel
- GET /api/streams - list all streams with filtering support
- GET /api/channel-groups - list channel groups (for filter dropdowns)
- GET /api/stream-groups - list stream groups (for filter dropdowns)
- GET /api/providers - list M3U accounts/providers (for filter dropdowns)
- POST /api/channels/{id}/add-stream - add stream to channel
- POST /api/channels/{id}/remove-stream - remove stream from channel
- Query params for filtering: channel_group, m3u_account, search/name

title: Debug channel groups not all displaying
description: Some channel groups like 'National Sports Networks' and 'Local Channels' are not showing in the UI. Need to investigate why groups are missing.

title: Move Upload Image button inline with URL input
description: Move the Upload Image button to be on the same line as the Add logo from URL input, removing the 'or' divider for a more consistent layout

title: Fix duplicate channel numbers when using push-down and drag operations in edit mode
Fix EPG Data endpoint path
description: Changed backend endpoint from /api/epg/data/ to /api/epg/epgdata/ to match Dispatcharr API. The EPG Data dropdown in the Edit Channel modal now properly fetches and displays EPG entries.

title: Fix Stream Profile endpoint path
description: Changed backend endpoint from /api/stream_profiles/ to /api/core/streamprofiles/ to match Dispatcharr API. The Stream Profile dropdown in the Edit Channel modal now properly shows all available profiles (ffmpeg, Proxy, Redirect, streamlink, etc.).

title: Add Get from EPG button for TVG-ID field
description: Added a 'Get from EPG' button next to the TVG-ID input field in the Edit Channel modal. Clicking it opens a searchable dropdown that allows users to search EPG data entries and automatically populate the TVG-ID field with the selected entry's tvg_id value.

title: Fix EPG Data API response handling
description: The frontend expected a paginated response with .results property, but Dispatcharr's EPG data endpoint returns a flat array. Fixed api.ts to return EPGData[] and App.tsx to use the array directly.

title: Fix EPG Data search with client-side filtering
description: Dispatcharr's EPG data API doesn't support server-side search. Implemented client-side filtering: EPG data is loaded once on mount, and search terms filter the local data by name or tvg_id. Also increased dropdown height from 200px to 300px and display limit from 50 to 100 items.

title: Add EPG source name display in EPG data dropdowns
Update Get from EPG button to copy TVG-ID when EPG data is selected
Add OS-style window titlebar to Edit Channel modal
Filter out auto-created channel groups from display
Fix Add and Upload button size mismatch
description: Make the Add and Upload buttons the same height in the logo add row

title: Fix EPG dropdown color contrast for better readability
description: Changed EPG dropdown colors to improve readability on dark background: name from #ccc to #fff, tvgid from #666 to #aaa, source from #646cff to #a8b4ff with lighter background

title: Add channel list filtering toggles to settings
Implement EPG Manager tab with drag-and-drop priority ordering
description:
Implemented EPG Manager tab with full functionality:
- Updated EPGSource type with all fields from Dispatcharr API (source_type, priority, status, refresh_interval, etc.)
- Added API functions: createEPGSource, updateEPGSource, deleteEPGSource, refreshEPGSource, triggerEPGImport
- Created EPGManagerTab component with drag-and-drop priority reordering using @dnd-kit
- Added EPGSourceModal for creating/editing EPG sources (XMLTV and Schedules Direct types)
- Shows source status (success/error/fetching/parsing), channel count, last update time
- Actions: toggle active, refresh, edit, delete
- Filters out dummy EPG sources (standard EPGs only)
- Created EPGManagerTab.css with full styling for list, modal, and responsive layout

title: Show duplicate stream count in bulk create modal before creation
description: Bulk create modal now detects duplicate stream names before creation and shows accurate channel count. When duplicates exist, displays: 'X channels will be created from Y streams (Z duplicate names will be merged)'. Channel number range and Create button reflect the actual unique count.

title: Resizable split pane with draggable divider for channels/streams
Renumber subsequent channels when deleting from contiguous list
description: When deleting a channel from a contiguous list, offer option to renumber subsequent channels (move them up). Also auto-renames channels if the channel number appears in the name.

title: Add country prefix removal option for bulk channel creation
description: When bulk creating channels, detect country prefixes (US, UK, CA, etc.) and offer option to remove them from channel names.
notes: Completed: Added country prefix removal option for bulk channel creation. When streams have country prefixes (US, UK, CA, etc.), users can choose to remove them from channel names. Detection is automatic - the option only appears when country prefixes are detected in the stream group. The prefix and any trailing punctuation (colon, hyphen, slash) are removed.

title: Move edit mode UI from banner to Channels pane header
Docker compose configuration for production deployment
description: Simplified docker-compose.yml for production deployment. Single container runs on port 6100, uses a named volume (ecm-config) for persistent settings storage, and includes host.docker.internal mapping for accessing Dispatcharr on the host machine.

title: Fix edit mode button sizes and add X icon to Cancel
Inline channel detail: show streams underneath channel when clicked
description: Replace the separate ChannelDetail pane with inline expansion. When a channel is clicked, its assigned streams should appear directly underneath the channel item in the channels list, similar to an accordion pattern. This provides a more compact and intuitive UI.

title: TVG-ID assignment for channels
description:
Add ability to set TVG-ID on channels. Features:
- Channel model has tvg_id field (string, max 255 chars, nullable)
- Manual text entry for tvg_id
- Option to auto-assign tvg_id from EPG data (EPGData has tvg_id field) if an EPG is assigned
- Show current tvg_id in channel edit view
- TVG-ID is used for EPG program matching

title: Add inline channel name editing
close_reason: Added ability to edit channel names inline when in Edit Mode. Click on a channel name to edit it. Includes CSS styling for editable state and input field.

title: Make stream checkboxes match channel checkboxes using Material Icons
description: Changed stream checkboxes from Unicode characters to Material Icons to match channel checkboxes. Both now use check_box/check_box_outline_blank icons at 1.1rem.

title: Bulk selection and operations
description:
Multi-select support for bulk operations:

Selection mechanics:
- Click to select single item
- Ctrl+Click to toggle additional items
- Shift+Click to select range
- Ctrl+A to select all (in focused pane)
- Click elsewhere to deselect all
- Visual selection indicator (checkbox or highlight)

Bulk operations for streams:
- Add multiple selected streams to a channel (drag group or button)
- Remove multiple streams from a channel

Bulk operations for channels:
- Delete multiple channels
- Assign multiple channels to a group
- Renumber selected channels sequentially

UI:
- Selection count indicator
- Bulk action toolbar/context menu when items selected
- Confirmation dialogs for destructive operations

title: Stream profile assignment for channels
description:
Add ability to set stream profile on channels. Features:
- Channel model has stream_profile_id field (integer, nullable)
- Option to use default profile (null/unset)
- Dropdown to select from available stream profiles (/api/stream_profiles/)
- StreamProfile model has: id, name, command, parameters, is_active, locked
- Show current profile name in channel edit view
- Profile determines how streams are processed/transcoded

title: Add M3U Manager tab and reorder tabs
description: Added M3U Manager tab as placeholder. Reordered tabs to: M3U Manager, EPG Manager, Channel Manager, Logo Manager, Settings. Updated TabNavigation.tsx with new tab type and order. Created M3UManagerTab.tsx placeholder component. Updated App.tsx with lazy loading for M3UManagerTab. Updated README.md with new tab order. Fixed Settings label text for timezone.

title: Assign EPG source to channel
description:
Add ability to assign an EPG source to a channel. Features:
- Edit channel to select from available EPG sources (/api/epg/sources/)
- Channel model has epg_data_id field (integer, nullable) referencing EPGData
- EPGData has epg_source field linking to EPGSource
- Show currently assigned EPG source name on channel details
- Dropdown/autocomplete for EPG source selection

title: Fix Edit Mode timer not updating
description: The Edit Mode Active timer shows (0s) and never updates. Fix the timer to properly count up while in edit mode.

title: Fix channel drag between groups in edit mode
description:
Implemented cross-group channel dragging in edit mode:

1. Added useDroppable import from @dnd-kit/core
2. Created DroppableGroupHeader component that makes group headers droppable targets
3. Moved DndContext from per-group to wrap all groups in pane-content
4. Updated handleDragEnd to detect drops on group headers (group-{id}) and move channels between groups
5. Added CSS styling for drop-target state on group headers (dashed purple border)

When dragging a channel onto a different group's header:
- The channel's group_id is updated
- A staged operation is created with description like 'Moved X from Y to Z'
- Local state updates immediately for smooth UX

title: Change group filter to show used groups by default
description:
Changed group filter behavior so groups with channels are always shown by default:

1. Removed the filter logic that hid groups when selectedGroups was populated
2. Changed dropdown to only show empty groups (groups with channels are always visible)
3. Updated button text: 'Show Empty Groups' when none selected, '+N empty group(s)' when some selected
4. Updated dropdown placeholder and empty state messages
5. Uncategorized group now always shows if it has channels (not dependent on selectedGroups)

The selectedGroups array now controls which additional empty groups to show, rather than filtering which groups are visible.

title: Rework group filter to auto-select groups with channels
description:
Reworked group filter to auto-select groups with channels:

1. Added useEffect in App.tsx that auto-selects all groups containing channels when data first loads
2. Added channelGroupFilterInitialized ref to prevent overriding user selections after initial load
3. Reverted renderGroup to filter based on selectedGroups (only show groups in the selection)
4. Updated dropdown to show all groups (not just empty ones)
5. Button shows 'N group(s) selected' or 'No groups selected'
6. Uncategorized group always shows if it has channels (it's not in channelGroups array)

Behavior:
- On load, groups with channels are automatically checked in the dropdown
- Users can uncheck groups to hide them
- Users can check empty groups to show them
- The selection persists until page refresh

title: Sort selected groups to top of dropdown
notes: Sorted selected groups to top of dropdown by adding a sort function that prioritizes selected groups (checked items) before unselected ones, maintaining alphabetical order within each section

title: Add modal for cross-group channel drag with number options and auto-sync warning
notes:
Added cross-group move modal that appears when dragging a channel to a different group header. The modal:
1. Shows source and target group names
2. Displays warning if target group is auto-populated by channel sync
3. Shows the target group's channel number range
4. Offers two options: keep current channel number or assign next available number in the target group's range
5. Full CSS styling matching the app's design language

title: Add auto-sync indicator to channel group headers
notes: Added sync icon indicator to channel group headers for groups that are auto-populated by channel sync. The icon appears after the group name with a tooltip explaining what it means.

title: Fix incorrect auto-sync indicator flagging
description: Investigated auto-sync indicator showing on SiriusXM: Sports Talk. Found that the frontend logic is working correctly - the group is marked as auto-sync because the Infinity M3U account has group 86 configured with auto_channel_sync: true and group_override: 371 (SiriusXM: Sports Talk). This is a backend data configuration issue, not a frontend bug. The indicator correctly shows that group 371 receives auto-created channels from group 86. Debug logging was added temporarily and then removed.

title: Add auto-rename when assigning new channel number in cross-group move
description: Added auto-rename functionality when assigning a new channel number during cross-group moves. Uses the existing computeAutoRename function to update the channel name if the channel number appears in the name (e.g., '123 | Channel Name' becomes '456 | Channel Name' when moved to channel 456). The name change is included in both the local state update and the staged operation.

title: Improve readability of edit mode info in channel edit modal
description: Improved readability of edit mode info text in the channel pane header. Changed edit-mode-count color from #c7d2fe to #e0e7ff (brighter) and edit-mode-duration color from #818cf8 to #a5b4fc (brighter) for better contrast against the dark background.

title: Fix text contrast in edit mode done count badge
notes: Changed .edit-mode-done-count badge from light green (#4ade80) with dark text to darker green (#16a34a) with white text (#ffffff) for better contrast and readability

title: Add multi-select channel functionality for bulk moves
notes:
Implemented multi-select functionality for channels:
- Added selectedChannelIds state and handlers in App.tsx
- Ctrl/Cmd+click to toggle individual channel selection
- Shift+click to select range of channels within a group
- Visual checkbox indicators in edit mode
- Multi-selected channels highlighted with blue styling
- Dragging a selected channel drags all selected channels
- Cross-group move modal updated to show multiple channels being moved
- Sequential channel number assignment option when moving multiple channels
- Auto-rename applied to each channel when numbers change

title: Add custom starting number option to cross-group move modal
description: Added a third option to the cross-group move modal that allows users to specify a custom starting channel number when moving channels between groups. Changes: 1) Added customStartingNumber state to ChannelsPane.tsx 2) Reset custom number when modal closes 3) Added new 'Custom starting number' section with input field, Apply button, and range preview for multi-channel moves 4) Added CSS styles for the new option (.move-option-custom, .custom-number-row, .custom-number-input, .custom-number-apply-btn, .custom-number-range)

title: Fix cross-group move modal width for custom starting number option
description: Increased cross-group move modal width from 480px to 500-560px to accommodate the custom starting number option. Also increased custom number input field width from 100-120px to 120-140px.

title: Add drag overlay preview when moving channels
description: Added a drag overlay that shows a visual preview when dragging channels. The overlay displays the drag indicator icon, channel number, and channel name. When dragging multiple selected channels, it shows '+X more' badge to indicate the total count being moved.

title: Allow dropping channels between other channels within a group
description: Allow dropping channels onto other channels in a different group to trigger cross-group move. When dropping on a specific channel, the suggested channel number is the drop target's number. Modal shows 'Insert at position' with playlist_add icon when dropping on a channel vs 'Assign sequential numbers' when dropping on a group header.

title: Fix adding streams to newly created channels in edit mode
Fix individual EPG source refresh endpoint
description: Added individual EPG source refresh endpoint. Backend: added refresh_epg_source method to dispatcharr_client.py and /api/epg/sources/{id}/refresh route to main.py. Frontend: restored refreshEPGSource function in api.ts and updated EPGManagerTab to use it. Endpoint pattern follows /api/epg/sources/{id}/refresh/ similar to M3U refresh pattern.

title: Add visual drop indicator between channels when dragging
description:
Added a visual drop indicator that shows between channels when dragging. When dragging a channel over other channels, a glowing purple/blue line appears to show exactly where the channel will be inserted. Features:

- Added dropIndicator state to track which channel is being hovered and whether to show indicator before or after
- Updated handleDragOver to calculate drop position based on drag direction and target channel
- Modified renderGroup to render visual drop indicator lines between channels
- Added CSS animations with pulsing glow effect for the drop indicator
- Shows indicator before target channel when moving up or across groups
- Shows indicator after target channel when moving down within same group
- Indicator clears when drag ends or moves to group header

title: Fix cross-group insert to renumber existing channels
description:
Fixed cross-group insert to properly renumber existing channels at insertion point.

When inserting a channel between other channels in a different group using the 'Insert at position' option:
- Existing channels at and after the insertion point are now shifted up by the number of channels being inserted
- Auto-rename is applied to shifted channels if enabled (e.g., '100 ESPN' becomes '101 ESPN')
- Both moved and shifted channel updates are staged as separate operations for undo/redo support
- Prevents duplicate channel numbers that would have occurred before this fix

title: Fix mismatched header heights between Channels and Streams panes
description: The Channels pane header is taller than the Streams pane header due to additional edit mode elements. Add consistent min-height to both headers.

title: Fix mismatched filter section heights between Channels and Streams panes
description: The filter areas have different heights due to different filter row structures.

title: Fix header and filter height alignment between panes
description: Changed both header sections (.pane-header) and filter sections (.pane-filters) from min-height to fixed height in ChannelsPane.css and StreamsPane.css. This ensures both panes have exactly the same header height (56px) and filter height (96px) for a continuous visual appearance.

title: Add option to renumber source group after cross-group move
description: Added option to renumber source group after moving channels to a different group. When channels are moved out of a group and create gaps in the channel numbering, a checkbox appears in the cross-group move modal offering to 'Close gaps in source group'. When checked, the remaining channels in the source group are renumbered sequentially starting from the original minimum channel number, with auto-rename applied if enabled.

title: Redesign cross-group move modal with radio selections and single action button
description: Redesigned the cross-group move modal to use radio button selections instead of action buttons. Options (Keep current numbers, Assign sequential numbers, Custom number) are now selectable with a single 'Move Channel(s)' button at the bottom. The custom number input only appears when that option is selected. This makes the modal flow clearer and more intuitive.

title: Fix dropping channels at end of group
description: Added DroppableGroupEnd component using @dnd-kit's useDroppable hook to allow dropping channels at the end of a group. Updated handleDragOver and handleDragEnd to handle group-end-{groupId} drop targets. The drop zone appears after the last channel in each group and shows a drop indicator line when hovering.

title: Fix group-end drop zone detection for cross-group moves
description: Fixed group-end drop zone detection by moving DroppableGroupEnd outside SortableContext. Also moved custom number input inline within the radio option selection.

title: Fix undo/redo not updating UI in ChannelsPane
description: Fixed undo/redo not visually reverting changes in the UI. The issue was that ChannelsPane has its own localChannels state for drag operations, which was only syncing with the channels prop when entering/exiting edit mode. Now it also syncs when channels changes during edit mode (which happens when undo/redo updates the workingCopy), but only when not actively dragging to preserve drag state.

title: Batch related operations into single undo/redo point
description: Implemented batch undo/redo to group multiple related operations into a single undo point. Added UndoEntry type that contains an array of StagedOperations. Added startBatch/endBatch functions to useEditMode hook. Updated handleCrossGroupMoveConfirm and handleDragEnd to wrap multiple operations in a batch. Now moving channels between groups or reordering within a group creates a single undo point regardless of how many individual channel updates occur.

title: Smarter undo batching for cross-group channel moves
description: Implemented smarter undo batching for cross-group channel moves. Now creates separate undo entries for each logical phase: (1) Move channels to target group, (2) Shift existing channels in target group if inserting at a position, (3) Renumber remaining channels in source group if closing gaps. This gives users 1-3 undo steps instead of one giant batch, allowing them to step through the operation logically.

title: Show undo entry count instead of individual operation count
description: Changed stagedOperationCount to show the number of undo entries (batches) instead of individual operations. This means if a cross-group move creates 3 batches (move, shift, renumber) containing 14 total operations, the UI will show '3 changes' instead of '14 changes'.

title: Fix modifiedChannelIds not updating correctly on undo/redo operations
description: Added computeModifiedChannelIds helper function that compares working copy against baseline snapshot. Updated localUndo and localRedo to recalculate modifiedChannelIds after each operation, so the 'modified' highlighting accurately reflects only channels that differ from baseline at each step.

title: Sort and renumber channels in a group - sort alphabetically by name and renumber starting at user-chosen number
description: Added Sort & Renumber feature for channel groups. In edit mode, a sort button appears on group headers when hovering. Clicking it opens a modal that shows a preview of channels sorted alphabetically with sequential numbers starting from a user-chosen number. The operation is batched as a single undo step.

title: Add option to strip channel numbers from names when sorting
description: Added option to Sort & Renumber modal to strip channel numbers from names when sorting. This allows channels like '101 | ESPN' to sort as 'ESPN' instead of starting with '1'. The option is enabled by default and includes: new state (sortStripNumbers), helper function (getNameForSorting), updated sorting logic in both confirm handler and preview, checkbox UI in modal, and CSS styling.

title: Create README.md documentation
description: Created comprehensive README.md documenting all features including: channel management, stream management, edit mode with staged editing, drag-and-drop, multi-select, sort and renumber, logo management, EPG integration, stream profiles, global history, channel list filters, provider management, API endpoints, keyboard shortcuts, and deployment instructions.

title: Setup GitHub Actions CI/CD for dev and main branches
description: Created GitHub Actions CI/CD workflow that: builds Docker images on push to dev and main branches, pushes to GitHub Container Registry (ghcr.io), uses Docker Buildx for multi-platform builds (amd64, arm64), includes caching for faster builds, creates appropriate tags (branch name, SHA, latest for main, dev for dev branch), also builds on PRs to main (but doesn't push).

title: Add security scanning to CI/CD pipeline
description: Added comprehensive security scanning to CI/CD pipeline: npm audit for frontend dependencies (fails on high/critical), pip-audit for backend Python dependencies, CodeQL analysis for JavaScript/TypeScript and Python code scanning, Trivy container vulnerability scanner for the built Docker image (fails on high/critical). All security scans must pass before the build job can run.

title: Fix Python dependency security vulnerabilities
description: Updated Python dependencies to fix security vulnerabilities: fastapi 0.109.0->0.115.0+ (PYSEC-2024-38), python-multipart 0.0.6->0.0.18+ (CVE-2024-24762, CVE-2024-53981), starlette via fastapi update (CVE-2024-47874, CVE-2025-54121). Also updated uvicorn, httpx, pydantic, and pydantic-settings to latest stable versions.

title: Add IaC scanning and DAST testing to CI/CD pipeline
Fix Trivy scan failing due to uppercase in image name
Fix IaC and DAST security scan failures in CI/CD
Fix DAST scan still failing on warnings
Update CodeQL from v3 to v4
Release version 0.1.0 to main
Update README docker-compose example
Add bulk channel creation from stream groups
description: Add ability to bulk create channels from M3U stream groups. Features: button on stream group headers in Streams pane (visible in edit mode), modal to configure starting channel number and target channel group, auto-assign each stream to its created channel, option to use same group name or select/create different group.

title: Require edit mode for stream operations
description:
Stream drag-drop onto channels, stream removal, and stream reordering now require edit mode to be active. Changes made:
- handleStreamDrop in ChannelsPane.tsx only allows drops in edit mode
- handleStreamDragOver only shows visual feedback in edit mode
- handleRemoveStream only works in edit mode
- handleStreamDragEnd (reorder) only works in edit mode
- handleStreamDropOnChannel and handleBulkStreamDropOnChannel in App.tsx now require edit mode
- SortableStreamItem component now accepts isEditMode prop and disables drag handles and hides remove button when not in edit mode
- Added CSS for disabled stream-drag-handle state

title: Channel groups as tree with drag-and-drop channel assignment
description:
Channel groups displayed as a tree structure in the left pane:

Structure:
- Channel groups are collapsible tree nodes
- Channels are leaf nodes nested under their group
- Ungrouped channels shown at root level or in 'Uncategorized' group

Drag-and-drop operations:
- Drag channel into a group to assign it
- Drag channel out of group (to root or another group) to reassign
- Drag channel between groups to move it
- API call to update channel's channel_group_id on drop

Group management (TBD - UI style pending):
- Create new channel groups
- Rename groups
- Delete groups (move channels to ungrouped or another group)
- Reorder groups

Visual:
- Expand/collapse icons for groups
- Channel count badge per group
- Indentation for hierarchy
- Drag handles or full-row draggable

Note: Detailed UI styling to be determined later

title: Stream priority reordering within channels
description:
Allow reordering streams within a channel to set priority:
- When viewing a channel's assigned streams, allow drag-and-drop reorder
- First stream = highest priority (used for playback)
- Visual drag handles for stream items
- API call to update channel's streams array order
- Optimistic UI with rollback on error
- Visual indication of priority order (numbers or position)

title: Add delete channel functionality
Show provider name on inline channel streams
description: Display the provider/M3U account name for each stream shown in the inline channel detail view, so users can identify which provider each stream comes from.

title: Show auto channel groups but hide empty groups unless selected or newly created
Add Channel Defaults settings section with sidebar navigation and bulk create integration
description: Added Channel Defaults as a new sidebar section in Settings tab. New settings include: include channel number in name, number separator choice, remove country prefix, and timezone preference (East/West/Both). These defaults are loaded in the bulk create modal and show '(from settings)' indicator when active. Backend config.py and main.py updated with new fields. Frontend StreamsPane, ChannelManagerTab, App.tsx, and SettingsModal updated to handle the new settings.

title: Drag-and-drop: Add streams to channels
description:
Implement drag-and-drop functionality to add streams to channels:
- Streams in right pane are draggable
- Channels in left pane are drop targets
- Visual feedback during drag (highlight valid drop targets)
- On drop: call API to add stream to channel
- Optimistic UI update with rollback on error
- Success/error toast notifications
- Prevent duplicate stream assignment (visual indicator + validation)

Tech: Use react-dnd or @dnd-kit/core for drag-and-drop implementation

title: Fix channel drag-drop to use insertion/shift behavior instead of swap
Frontend: Filtering for channels and streams
description:
Add filtering capabilities to both panes:

Channels pane filters:
- Channel group dropdown (populated from API)
- Name search (interactive text input with debounce)

Streams pane filters:
- Stream/channel group dropdown
- Provider/M3U account dropdown (populated from API)
- Name search (interactive text input with debounce)

Implementation:
- Filter controls at top of each pane
- Filters applied client-side for responsiveness, with option to query server
- Clear/reset filters button
- Filter state preserved during session
- URL query params for shareable filter states (optional)

title: Improve channel editing UX: double-click to edit and hover delete button
description: Changed channel number and name editing from single-click to double-click to make it easier to select channels without accidentally entering edit mode. Added a hover-visible delete button on each channel row (only visible in edit mode) for quick access to channel deletion. Removed the redundant delete button from the expanded channel section.

title: Add East/West timezone preference for bulk channel creation
notes: Completed: Added East/West timezone preference for bulk channel creation. When streams have regional variants (e.g., HBO and HBO West), users can choose: East Coast (use East feeds, skip West), West Coast (use West feeds only), or Keep Both (create separate channels). Detection is automatic - the option only appears when regional variants are detected in the stream group.

title: Add Cancel Edit Mode button with confirmation
description: Add a Cancel button to exit edit mode. If there are staged changes, show a confirmation dialog before discarding them.

title: Group streams by source and sort alphabetically within groups
Add channel number and name editing to Edit Channel modal
description: Extended Edit Channel modal to allow editing channel number and name fields. Added ChannelMetadataChanges interface fields, state management, editable header fields UI, and corresponding CSS styles.

title: Logo modal should only open in Edit Mode
description: Currently clicking on a channel's logo opens the logo selection modal even when not in Edit Mode. The logo should only be clickable/editable when Edit Mode is enabled, similar to how other editing operations are gated.
close_reason: Fixed: Logo modal now only opens when Edit Mode is enabled. Added isEditMode check and updated CSS to remove hover effects when not editable.

title: Fix auto-rename not working on channel drag-drop reorder
description: When dragging channels to reorder them, the auto-rename setting is not being applied even when enabled.

title: Add channel number prefix feature with separator choice
description: Implemented channel number prefix feature with separator choice (-, :, |) in bulk channel creation modal. Reorganized modal UI with collapsible 'Naming Options' section that groups country prefix and channel number options together. Updated api.ts, StreamsPane.tsx, StreamsPane.css, App.tsx, and README.md. Version 0.1.17.

title: Require edit mode to create new channels
description: Changed the New button to only be visible when in edit mode. This simplifies the workflow and ensures channel creation follows the same edit-then-commit pattern as other operations.

title: Require channel number for new channels and handle conflicts
description: All channels must have a number. Add Channel modal should require a number and when it conflicts, ask user to push channels down or add to end of group.

title: Fix push-down creating duplicate channel numbers
description: Fixed issue where push-down during channel creation caused duplicate channel numbers. The fix involved: 1) Splitting the localChannels sync useEffect to prevent overwrites during edit mode, 2) Only syncing when entering edit mode, not on every channels prop change, 3) Manually adding new channels to localChannels after API creation.

title: Channel reordering with automatic renumbering
description:
Drag-and-drop reordering of channels with smart renumbering:
- Channels can be dragged to reorder in the list
- When a channel is inserted between two others, renumber affected channels
- Example: channels 1,2,3 - moving 3 between 1 and 2 results in: 1,32,23
- Use the /api/channels/channels/assign/ bulk endpoint for efficient renumbering
- Visual drag handle or entire row draggable
- Optimistic UI update with rollback on error
- Consider decimal numbers for insertion without full renumber (e.g., 1.5 between 1 and 2) as alternative mode

title: Dispatcharr API client with JWT authentication
description:
Create a Python API client for Dispatcharr:
- JWT token authentication (login, token refresh)
- GET channels list with pagination support
- GET streams list with pagination support  
- GET streams for a specific channel
- PATCH channel to update streams array (add/remove streams)
- Error handling and retry logic
- Environment-based configuration (DISPATCHARR_URL, credentials)

title: Project setup: Docker, FastAPI backend, React frontend scaffolding
description:
Set up the foundational project structure:
- Dockerfile for single container deployment
- FastAPI backend with CORS, static file serving
- React frontend with Vite or Create React App
- docker-compose.yml for development
- Environment variable configuration for Dispatcharr URL and credentials
- Basic health check endpoint

title: Apply auto-rename when reordering channels by drag-drop
description:
Fixed auto-rename not applying when channels are reordered via drag-drop.

Changes:
1. Extracted auto-rename logic into reusable helper function 'computeAutoRename' that takes channel name, old number, and new number and returns the new name if a rename should apply.

2. Updated contiguous reorder path (when dragging channels in a sequential group):
   - Now computes auto-rename for each affected channel
   - Stages individual channel updates with both number and name changes
   - Updates local state with renamed names immediately

3. Updated non-contiguous swap path (when dragging channels in a non-sequential group):
   - Computes auto-rename for both swapped channels
   - Includes name changes in the staged updates
   - Updates local state with renamed names immediately

Example: If channels are '110 Fox News', '111 Fox Business', '112 Fox Weather' and you drag Fox News to after Fox Weather, they now become '110 Fox Business', '111 Fox Weather', '112 Fox News' with the numbers in the names updated.

title: Add channel groups to visible list on-demand
description: Allow users to selectively add channel groups to the channel list view, either by selecting them in the filter or when creating a new group

title: Merge streams with identical names during bulk channel creation
description: When bulk creating channels from a stream group, streams with identical names from different M3U providers are now merged into a single channel with all matching streams assigned. This provides multi-provider redundancy. The success message now shows how many streams were merged.

title: Channel number editing in UI
description:
Allow editing channel numbers directly in the UI:
- Display channel number for each channel in the list
- Inline editing (click to edit) or edit modal
- Validation: only allow floats or integers
- API call to update channel number on save
- Handle conflicts (warn if number already in use)
- Visual feedback on save success/failure

title: Gracenote Station ID for channels
description:
Add ability to set Gracenote Station ID on channels. Features:
- Channel model has tvc_guide_stationid field (string, max 255 chars, nullable)
- Numeric integer entry field for station ID
- Used for TVC/Gracenote guide matching
- Show current station ID in channel edit view

title: Replace Cancel button with unsaved changes confirmation
description: Remove redundant Cancel button from Edit Channel modal. Add confirmation dialog when closing with unsaved changes asking user to confirm discarding changes.

title: Searchable group filter dropdown in Channels pane
Swap Cancel and Done button positions
Track stream reorders and show detailed changes in exit dialog
description:
Fixed two issues with the edit mode exit dialog:

1. Stream reorders were not being tracked in the summary - added 'reorderChannelStreams' case to getSummary() in useEditMode.ts

2. Exit dialog now shows a detailed list of all pending changes:
   - Added OperationDetail interface to editMode.ts types
   - Added operationDetails array to EditModeSummary
   - Updated getSummary() to populate operation details with descriptions
   - Added 'Show details' toggle button to EditModeExitDialog
   - Added scrollable details panel showing numbered list of all operations
   - Added CSS for toggle button and details panel styling

title: Sort channel groups by lowest channel number
Channel logo selection and upload
description:
Add ability to set channel logos. Features:
- Display logo on each channel row
- Edit channel to select from existing logos (/api/channels/logos/)
- Option to assign logo from assigned EPG data (icon_url from EPGData)
- Upload new logo from URL (/api/channels/logos/ POST with url)
- Upload logo from file (drag-and-drop interface, /api/channels/logos/upload/)
- Channel model has logo_id field (integer, nullable) to reference Logo

title: Fix channel view not updating after stream drop in edit mode
close_reason: Added streams prop to ChannelsPane and updated useEffect to use local streams list in edit mode instead of making API calls. This ensures staged stream additions are reflected immediately in the UI.

title: Show all channel groups including empty ones in channel list
description: Remove filter that hides empty channel groups from channel list

title: Show empty channel groups in channel list for drag-drop assignment
description: Empty channel groups should appear in the channel list so users can drag channels into them

title: Add channel group creation in edit mode
Settings UI for Dispatcharr connection configuration
description: Add a settings modal UI to configure Dispatcharr connection (URL, username, password) instead of requiring environment variables. Settings are stored in a JSON file (/config/settings.json) and persist across container restarts. Includes test connection button, auto-popup on first load when not configured, and Settings button in header.

title: Normalize stream names to merge quality variants (FHD, UHD, HD, SD)
notes: Completed: normalizeStreamName function strips quality suffixes (FHD, UHD, HD, SD, 4K, 1080P, etc.) from stream names for matching. Updated bulkCreateChannelsFromStreams to use normalized names. Updated StreamsPane modal preview to show normalized channel names with stream counts for merged channels.

title: Channel group filter with multi-select checkboxes, hide unused groups
Fix auto-rename to detect number prefix in name regardless of current channel number
Fix checkbox click in streams pane to toggle selection
description: Clicking the checkbox on a stream now toggles selection without requiring Ctrl/Cmd key. Added toggleSelect function to useSelection hook and wired it to the checkbox click handler with stopPropagation. Added hover styling to make checkbox look interactive.
